title.narrative: Education for Prosperity (formerly PNG-Aus Program for improved Perf in Ed)

description.narrative: The PNG-Australia Education for Prosperity (formerly Program for improved Performance in Education - PAPE) plays a vital role in providing strategic advice and delivering outcomes in particular supporting the PNG government to deliver on its own objectives. PAPE works by supporting a few targeted areas of the national education system to deliver better outcomes for students and documenting new and existing successful models of good practice which can, over time, be embedded in to the broader system. The six functions of PAPE are: 1) sub-program management; 2) grant management; 3) facilitation and enabling support to address system challenges; 4) design of new educational activities; 5) evidence gathering, research and analysis; 6) high quality policy advice.
